channel.title: R on Website Blog | Helen Evangelina
channel.description: Recent content in R on Website Blog | Helen Evangelina

item.title: Self-review of my Shiny app on COVID-19
item.description: This blog post will be a self-review of the shiny app on COVID-19 overview that I previously made which can be found here. Introduction COVID-19 has currently became a global trend since it spread worldwide from China’s Hubei Province.

item.title: State of COVID-19 Cases in Egypt
item.description: COVID-19 pandemic has been declared as a Public Health Emergency of International Concern by the World Health Organisation. It has been a global issue since the first outbreak from China’s Hubei Province, and it is destroying economies worldwide.

item.title: State of COVID-19 Cases in Spain
item.description: Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) has been a major issue since the virus spread worldwide from China’s Hubei Province, and it is affecting life.
